name: Vesting
description: Vesting contract designed to release funds on a monthly basis over a 12 month periodall funds deposited into the vesting contract are evenly distributed across the 12 monthsThe contract was designed to accomodate the needs of Leverage Token and as such may not be applicable in other circumstancesfor example there is no usage of safe math, as the values being vested by Leverage Token can't overflow so no need for extra gas cost.

eventDecorators.name: TokensReleased
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when maximum value of ETH is raised.

functionDecorators.name: isPrepared
functionDecorators.description: returns whether or note the vesting contract has been prepared.

functionDecorators.name: isReleased
functionDecorators.description: returns whether or not the given cycle has released the tokens.

functionDecorators.name: prepare
functionDecorators.description: prepares the contract for vesting, depositing tokens and marking the address that will be allowed to receive vested funds.

parameterDecorators.name: _amountToVest
parameterDecorators.description: is the amount of tokens to be vested.

parameterDecorators.name: _receiver
parameterDecorators.description: is the address that will be allowed to receive the withdrawn funds.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: release funds for the current vesting cyclewhile it is callable by anyone, funds are sent to a fixed addressregardless of who calls this function, so owner check is avoided to save gas.
